title: Cannot Purchase Anymore RP?
body:
I keep receiving This message. I don't know if this is a security precaution but it's been 3 days.  So what's happening? {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

I've used my card so far and never encountered this till 3 days ago.

replies.body: I'm not certain why that error is occurring, but we'd like to take a look and help you individually.  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can see what's going on.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
